2025-10-11.title: John 3:16
2025-10-11.content: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son.

2025-10-12.title: Philippians 4:13
2025-10-12.content: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

2025-10-13.title: Proverbs 3:5
2025-10-13.content: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
